text: The 2013 El Reno tornado happened on May 31, 2013. It happened close to the city of El Reno, Oklahoma in central Oklahoma. It was the widest tornado ever recorded. This tornado also was found to have some of the strongest winds ever found. One mobile Doppler weather radar found very high winds of 296 miles per hour. These winds are slightly less than the 318 miles per hour winds detected in a tornado on May 3, 1999 while it was close to Bridge Creek, Oklahoma in the Oklahoma City metropolitan area. ==Notes== ==References== Category:Tornadoes in the United States Category:2010s in Oklahoma Category:2013 in the United States El Reno tornado Category:May 2013 events
title: 2013 El Reno tornado
